courses.advice_detail_en: Perfect temperature for running. You can slightly increase your usual pace. Light breeze with little impact on running. The surface is slightly wet. As long as you are careful when cornering or braking, running should be fine. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
